A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: To say \" this is not your father's Star Wars \" is an understatement. The Last Jedi is a mess....it is a bloated\, misdirected left turn change of all that you love Star Wars for.  Too many great characters are underutilized or not used at all\, the main villain who is supposed to be this fearsome dark force badass is dispatched by a trick.  It just doesn't work......Critics can be paid to provide amazing overwhelmingly positive reviews but to have a fan base review number half that of the critics is telling.\nDisney...Rian Johnson...you messed up !
